column4: i give up, reinstalling grub on windows installed ubuntu doesnt work!!
no grub won't work on a wubi (windows install) system,  I'm not sure how you could fix a wubi loader.
ok :( I tried few hacks but ur right. Any clue how i can take bacup of my data? I want few patches!!

I guess to at least boot you will have to use a windows install disk to fix the mbr then find a way to backup the virtual partitions that the wubi install created inside the windows partition.  then install a ubuntu system and find a way to mount and recover the data inside them
